subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The legacy of the Hartford Whalers’ best teams, including the groups that made five straight playoff appearances in the late 1980s, lives on in an extended cast of prominent N.H.L. alumni.
snippet: The legacy of the Hartford Whalers’ best teams, including the groups that made five straight playoff appearances in the late 1980s, lives on in an extended cast of prominent N.H.L. alumni.
